article.title: Constraint on the velocity dependent dark matter annihilation cross section from gamma-ray and kinematic observations of dwarf galaxies

choices: The velocity dispersion profile of Willman 1.
The stellar density profile of Willman 1.

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of model, along with a background component, is used to fit the stellar density of Reticulum II in Figure 2?
What is the approximate scale radius (rc) of the exponential model used to fit the stellar density of Triangulum II in Figure 3?
What does the unbinned likelihood function (Lunbin) in formula (5) primarily aim to achieve in the context of Jeans analysis?
choices: Determine the age of stars within a dSph.
Estimate the total mass of the dSph.
Find the best-fit parameters for the chosen DM density and velocity anisotropy profiles.
Calculate the distance to the dSph from Earth.
